trans-unit.source: Add MANIFEST.in. [WouterVH]
trans-unit.target: 添加 MANIFEST.in.[WouterVH]

trans-unit.source: Added
trans-unit.target: 新增

trans-unit.source: Added a method to get unavailable portlets of of a manager. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11343 [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Added a method to get unavailable portlets of of a manager. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/11343 [thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Added an adapter and IBlockingPortletManager marker interface which portlet managers can provide to block parent contextual portlets by default. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个适配器和 IBlockingPortletManager 标记接口,portlet 管理员可以提供该接口来默认屏蔽父级上下文 portlet。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Added properties to keep track of the manager name, category name and key/name in portlet assignment mappings. [optilude]
trans-unit.target: 添加了属性,以跟踪 portlet 分配映射中的管理器名称、类别名称和键/名称。[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Added support for showing/hiding of all portlets (PLIP #9286) [igbun]
trans-unit.target: 增加了对显示/隐藏所有 portlet 的支持 (PLIP #9286)[igbun]。

trans-unit.source: Adjusted some tests, so they work on both Zope 2.10 and 2.11. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 调整了一些测试,所以它们在Zope 2.10和2.11上都能工作。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: An extension of zope.viewlet to support dynamic portlets
trans-unit.target: zope.viewlet的扩展,支持动态portlet。

trans-unit.source: Avoid a variety of zope.app dependencies in favor of Zope Toolkit packages. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 避免各种zope.app的依赖,而采用Zope工具包包。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Avoid some test dependencies. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 避免一些测试依赖性。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Changed a type() comparison into a isinstance comparison. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 将type()比较改为isinstance比较。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Clarified license and copyright statements. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 澄清了许可证和版权声明。[汉诺什]

trans-unit.source: Delegate to ILocalPortletAssignmentManager for category blacklist retrieval. This allows a custom adapter to override the default blacklist settings per portlet manager. [elro]
trans-unit.target: 委托 ILocalPortletAssignmentManager 进行类别黑名单检索。这允许自定义适配器覆盖每个portlet管理器的默认黑名单设置。[elro]

trans-unit.source: Do not break in placeless portlet retriever if there is no underlying code available for existing portlet assignment. [vipod]
trans-unit.target: 如果现有的 portlet 任务没有可用的底层代码,则不要中断 placeless portlet retriever。[vipod]

trans-unit.source: Ensure the keys stored in a portlet assignment mapping are always unicode. This is necessary because an OOBTree will, once one unicode key has been added, force all keys to unicode. This can lead to unicode decode errors. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6100 [optilude]
trans-unit.target: Ensure the keys stored in a portlet assignment mapping are always unicode. This is necessary because an OOBTree will, once one unicode key has been added, force all keys to unicode. This can lead to unicode decode errors. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6100 [optilude]

trans-unit.source: Fix/workaround for http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8128 (UnicodeDecodeError within _coerce() caused by external data with wrong encoding). [ajung]
trans-unit.target: Fix/workaround for http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8128 (UnicodeDecodeError within _coerce() caused by external data with wrong encoding). [ajung]

trans-unit.source: Fixed ‘SyntaxError: non-keyword arg after keyword arg’ in unicode call. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: Fixed ‘SyntaxError: non-keyword arg after keyword arg’ in unicode call. [maurits]

trans-unit.source: Fixed some deprecation warnings. Code style: black, isort Fix tests, also do not leave closed files. [jensens] (#4)
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些弃用警告。代码风格:黑色,isort 修复测试,也不留下已关闭的文件。[jensens](#4)

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修复。

trans-unit.source: Graceful handling of portlets with missing implementation. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: 优雅地处理缺少实现的 portlet。[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: Initial package structure. [zopeskel]
trans-unit.target: 初始包结构。[zopeskel]

trans-unit.source: Made tests run under Zope 2.11. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 在Zope 2.11下进行测试[hannosch]。

trans-unit.source: Make it possible to rely on the
trans-unit.target: 使其能够依靠

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: 小幅更新包装。(#1)

trans-unit.source: Moved test-only dependencies to a test extra requirement. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 将只需测试的依赖关系移至测试的额外需求。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 新特点:

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概述

trans-unit.source: PLIP207: Allow custom portlet managers, i.e., allow specifying an alternative portlet manager class through GenericSetup. [sirgarr]
trans-unit.target: PLIP207:允许自定义 portlet 管理器,即允许通过 GenericSetup 指定一个替代的 portlet 管理器类。[sirgarr]

trans-unit.source: PLIPs 205 and 218: Allow registering portlet types to multiple portlet manager interfaces, require portlet types to be explicitly registered for portlet manager interfaces, enable modifying registrations through GenericSetup, and restrict most default Plone portlet types to left/ right/dashboard columns. [sirgarr]
trans-unit.target: PLIPs 205和218。允许将portlet类型注册到多个portlet管理器接口,要求portlet类型必须明确注册到portlet管理器接口,允许通过GenericSetup修改注册,并将大多数默认的Plone portlet类型限制为左/右/仪表板列。[sirgarr]

trans-unit.source: Portlets are a bit like viewlets, except they can be manipulated at runtime, using local components. This package is used by plone.app.portlets to provide Plone-specific portlets, but should be generic enough to work on other platforms. It should work in a “pure Zope Toolkit” environment.
trans-unit.target: Portlets are a bit like viewlets, except they can be manipulated at runtime, using local components. This package is used by plone.app.portlets to provide Plone-specific portlets, but should be generic enough to work on other platforms. It should work in a “pure Zope Toolkit” environment.

trans-unit.source: Prevent possible unicode errors when creating portlet hashes. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: 防止在创建 portlet 哈希时可能出现的 unicode 错误。[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Protect the exception logging against funky portlets. In error cases even doing a repr() on the portlet might cause an infinite recursion error. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 保护异常日志,防止时髦的 portlet。在错误情况下,即使在 portlet 上执行 repr()也可能导致无限递归错误。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Replaced direct invocations of interfaces with queryAdapter calls. The former does a suboptimal getattr call internally. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 用queryAdapter调用代替了接口的直接调用。前者在内部做了一个次优的getattr调用。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Rerelease to fix problem on test server. [maurits]
trans-unit.target: 重新发布以解决测试服务器上的问题。[Maurits]

trans-unit.source: Specify package dependencies. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 指定软件包的依赖性。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Support Python 3. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 支持Python 3。[戴维萨格里]

trans-unit.source: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 只更新许可证到GPL 2版本。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 使用标准库的doctest模块。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use zope.browserpage if available. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 如果有,请使用zope.browserpage。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use zope.interface decorator. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: 使用zope.interface decorator。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: __portlet_metadata__
trans-unit.target: __portlet_metadata__

trans-unit.source: attribute to portlet renderers, to make it easier for a portlet to know how it was looked up (and thus reconstruct a URL to itself, for example). [optilude]
trans-unit.target: 属性,以便让 portlet 更容易知道它是如何被查找的 (例如,这样就可以重建一个指向自己的 URL)。[optilude]

trans-unit.source: of a portlet renderer to determine its availability. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10742. [enriquepablo, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: of a portlet renderer to determine its availability. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10742. [enriquepablo, hannosch]

trans-unit.source: plone.portlets provides a generic infrastructure for managing portlets.
trans-unit.target: plone.portlets为管理portlets提供了一个通用的基础架构。
